description: Primes base 10 that remain prime in one (and only one) other base b, 2<=b<10, expansions interpreted as decimal numbers.
links: Sebastian Petzelberger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 [This replaces an earlier b-file computed by Harvey P. Dale]
C. Rivera, PP&P Puzzle 24: Primes in several bases
